The Big Fat City
Written by Mahesh Dattani
Directed by Aashish Lalani
Produced by Elijah Cory



Don't change the Venmo description, please!
Ticket Pricing:
  • $10 at the door, so buy them now :).
  • $8 online and on the walk.
  • $7 if you purchase 6 tickets or more.
Terms and Conditions:
  • Online ticketing redirects you to a venmo transaction. Your ticket will only be reserved once you complete this venmo payment.
  • A computer program processes this, so make sure you don't change the description.
  • Once you complete the payment, all you have to do is show up to the venue and collect your ticket. Please be there earlier than the show time.
  • We reserve the right to return your money within 12 hours if we cannot accomodate you.
  • Scorecard for the referral system can be found here.
